alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:46PM EDT until July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR ...THE CITY OF NORFOLK...THE NORTHERN CITY OF CHESAPEAKE...THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH AND THE CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 344 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Norfolk State University, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Kempsville around 350 PM EDT. Princess Anne around 400 PM EDT. Virginia Beach around 405 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include South Norfolk, Rudee Heights, Portlock, Princess Anne Plaza, Sigma, Sandbridge Beach, Oceana NAS, Macons Corner, Pungo and Greenbrier. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
